revision.text:
[[File:Tray Launcher Sharp.png|thumb]]
Tray Launcher Sharp is a customizable menu driven system that works in an inherited fashion. It was made by [[SPZ]] using Visual C# and the .NET Framework. [http://spamzilla.unaux.com It is available on the Spamzilla website]. The idea is to setup your command line arguments for each level so that you only have to specify (for example) a version of GZDoom for all your IWADs or PWADs in one location.
